uchicago.src.sim.topology.graph.renderer
Class GraphRenderer

java.lang.Object
  uchicago.src.sim.topology.graph.renderer.GraphRenderer
public class GraphRenderer
extends java.lang.Object

This class should be used to render a graph. It can be subclassed in order to make more specific rules about display particulars.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Tom Howe
